infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to detect and classify furniture items.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to save captured images.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs location access to tag where items were captured.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Camera App to access your camera to detect furniture items.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Camera App to access your photos to save captured images.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow Camera App to save photos to your device.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Camera App to access your location to tag where items were captured.
